forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High near 15C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 59F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 12C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 54F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain diminishing to a few showers late. Low 7C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain tapering to a few showers late. Low near 45F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with periods of rain. High around 10C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High near 50F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 7C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 44F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers in the morning will give way to steady rain in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers in the morning, then overcast during the afternoon with occasional rain. High 49F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low around 40F. Winds light and variable.
